passed_checks.check_name: Ensure that ALB is configured with defensive or strictest desync mitigation mode
Ensure HTTP HTTPS Target group defines Healthcheck
code_block:
resource "aws_lb_target_group" "patients" {
  name     = "${var.name}-tg-patients"
  port     = 80
  protocol = "HTTP"
  vpc_id   = var.vpc_id
  target_type = "ip"

  health_check {
    path = "/health"
    protocol = "HTTP"
    matcher = "200"
    interval = 30
    timeout = 5
    healthy_threshold = 2
    unhealthy_threshold = 2
  }
}

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure HTTP HTTPS Target group defines Healthcheck
code_block:
resource "aws_lb_target_group" "appointments" {
  name     = "${var.name}-tg-appointments"

    health_check {
    path = "/health"

    unhealthy_threshold = 2
  }
}
